review_title: For a Christian College very negative work environment

job_title: Anonymous Employee in Saint Paul, MN
pros: Initially before the massive layoffs this was a great place to work. They encouraged royal care and promoted going to chapel as an employee.

They had numerous layoffs during my time there and several vice presidents left the university. Management has ignored employees requests to change back the work culture to what Bethel was and I would say that is a huge reason they have turnover now. review_title: Poor morale, low pay, and no room for advancement
